descriptionHTML:
This is a watch face whose design is inspired from umbrella of fiction movie Resident Evil. The shape of umbrella perfectly and naturally fits into the layout of watch face. Reading time on an umbrella is cool.
NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.



Features on one face:
✔ Time, Date, Month
✔ Three dimension Parallax effect
✔ Active in ambient mode
✔ Enable/Disable bezel mode
✔ Bezel splatter
✔ Hands splatter
✔ Fahrenheit/Celsius unit
✔ Weather
✔ Temperature
✔ Watch/phone battery level
✔ Sector color picker


Support all models:
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ Motorola Moto 360
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Asus Zen Watch
✔ LG G watch
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3


Weather support:
http://openweathermap.org/


How to launch:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press the watch screen and select WearvisPro from the watch face picker
3. You might need to wait a second before the app is synced for both phone and watch.


LEGAL: Umbrella is a copyright of Capcom. This product is not affiliated with, nor authorized, endorsed or licensed in any way by Capcom.
comments: Great idea Shame you can't seem the hands and the date is wrong. No way of using correct date format or changing hand colours.
